ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Abashi responds to the lullaby thread
ygData.messageBody:
Here's the URL -
http://boards.station.sony.com/everquest/Forum4/HTML/021917-7.html

At 02:47 PM 3/2/00 -1000, you wrote:
>From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
>Snipped from the Concert Hall board. No URL was given.
>
>I spoke to Geoff about the original author's tests. It looks like there
>might be
>*something* strange going on, but we'll have to run some more tests in House.
>Geoff will take another look at it after he gets done with the first draft of
>the expansion spells in the next few days.
>-Gordon
>
>Perhaps we're finally gonna see some corrective action on this. I sure
>hope GZ
>contacts either John Kim or Rokenn so one of them can explain the facts on
>this
>issue to him directly.
>
>Galtin of E'ci
